Additionally, if you are located in the UK, we note that we are generally processing your Personal Information in order to fulfil contracts we might have with you (for example if you interact with a Clinic who has purchased Products from us), or otherwise to pursue our legitimate business interests outlined in this Policy, unless we are required by law to obtain your consent for a particular processing operation.
As part of providing our Products, we may transfer your personal information to other regions, including to Ireland and Australia.
If you are domiciled in the United Kingdom, your Personal Information is processed by us in Ireland .
If you are domiciled in the United Kingdom, your Personal Information is processed by us in Ireland.
We collect and store Personal Information globally from each jurisdiction we operate in and from each legal entity that is owned or operated by us in different international jurisdictions and may transfer, process and store your Personal Information outside of your country of residence, to wherever we or our third-party service providers operate for the purpose of providing you the Products.
We hold your Personal Information on behalf of the Clinic in which you are dealing with.
We process your Personal Information to pursue the following legitimate interests, either for ourselves, our partners, or other third parties:
